name: n8n-nodes-base.calendlyTrigger
semantic_context: Starts the workflow when Calendly events occur

authentication.name: authentication

options.name: API Key or Personal Access Token

authentication.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。 与鉴权相关，注意不要在公共日志中输出敏感信息。

deprecationNotice.displayName: Action required: Calendly will discontinue API Key authentication on May 31, 2025. Update node to use OAuth2 authentication now to ensure your workflows continue to work.
deprecationNotice.name: deprecationNotice

scope.name: scope
scope.hint: Ignored if you are using an API Key

options.name: Organization
options.description: Triggers the webhook for all subscribed events within the organization

options.name: User
options.description: Triggers the webhook for subscribed events that belong to the current user

scope.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

options.name: Event Created
options.description: Receive notifications when a new Calendly event is created

options.name: Event Canceled
options.description: Receive notifications when a Calendly event is canceled
